title: Competence and Performance | Noam Chomsky | Lecture 09 | Urdu/Hindi/English
description:
These are the fundamental differences between the terms used in Linguistics. Competence vs Performance in Linguistics is the study made for the students of Linguistics. 

Khursheed Ujan is a lecturer in English serving for almost nine years. He has done BS in English (Linguistics) in 2009 and M.Phil in English (Literature) in 2020. The notes and presentations in the video lectures are research based through the recommended books from the authentic official sources. Thus, the presentations and notes presented in the lectures are sure to be helpful for the candidates who have been studying in different universities or those candidates are preparing for their upcoming competitive testes.
the contents for the Channel are as follows:
1.  Basic grammar for Beginners
2.  Linguistics (English)
3.  Literature  (English)
4.  Intermediate level English Lectures


There is a series of lectures in the subject of Linguistics
One can follow the following links for the lecture programs. This is a complete Lecture series for the students of Linguistics.
1. Langue and Parole
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xr7Zj3C3tvo
2. Diachronic versus Synchronic differences
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e0USJ3HbvRY
3. Syntagmatic and Paradigmatic Relation
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GCse9timB08
4. What is language?
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5ipvQMVyr58
